title: Resilient
content:
You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Resilient

All Classes at Level 4

BG3 Resilient Tips & Notes

Make sure you choose a Saving Throw you're not already proficient in as it won't stack. When your Constitution is an odd number (11-13-15-17 etc.), especially as a Caster, and you need a bonus for your Concentration checks, you can consider getting Resilient (Constitution) to get +4 Bonus to your Concentration (+ all other Constitution) checks + Hit Points equal to your lev
